Reviews.Title: Fantastic Bundle
Reviews.Author: Karen Spotloe
Reviews.Content: I searched for 3 years for my new digital SLR.  I'm used to Canon, but when I saw the pics produced with this Nikon D7000, I was blown away.  I researched prices and packages for a long time.  I read all the reviews and finally decided on this DavisMax Advanced Bundle III.  It has everything I was looking for.  I'm still saving for a Nikon 55-300mm f/4.5-5.6G ED VR AF-S DX Nikkor Zoom Lens and will most likely purchase that from DavisMax if they offer it.  Great bundle with great prices.  Everything as promised, thank you DavisMax!
